bio: Long-time Nix user, maintainer of the NixOS integration test driver, C++ book author

sessions.name: Mastering NixOS Integration Tests: Advanced Techniques for Fast and Robust Multi-VM Tests

bio: Rickard Nilsson has worked as a freelancing Nix/NixOS expert for over a decade. Five years ago he founded nixbuild.net, which is an advanced scalable build cluster for Nix offered both as a cloud service and for enterprise deployment.

Ron is CEO and co-founder of Flox and President of the NixOS Foundation. A former software engineer and leader in large-scale product development, Ron led developer products at Meta, supporting 20,000+ engineers. Realizing the limitations of existing tooling and recognizing the superpowers of Nix, Ron co-founded Flox to grow Nix and make it accessible to the wider engineering community.
tagLine: CEO/Co-Founder  at flox and Board Member/Treasurer at the NixOS Foundation

sessions.name: A Sustainable Nix, State of the Union
Fireside Chat with Kelsey Hightower & Ron Efroni: An Outsider’s Look at Nix

bio: Low level programmer, OS/Zig/Linux dev, Nixpkgs committer (LLVM). Likes to watch 大空スバル (Subaru Oozora).

Nix user and contributed for 5+ years, who brought flake support to search.nixos.org and mentored at summer of nix.
Now bringing nix to work at Flox.
tagLine: Software Engineer at Flox, bored with the common.

sessions.name: Nix is faster than no evaluation
